# South Carolina State Senate District 15

## About

South Carolina State Senate District 15 is a state legislative district
in South Carolina. The district spans parts of Greenville and Spartanburg Counties.

## Current senator

**Patricia Ann Wilson** (Republican) is the incumbent senator for this district.
She has served since 2020.

## 2026 election

### General election

The general election for South Carolina State Senate District 15
will take place on November 3, 2026.

### Candidates

The following candidates are running in the 2026 election:

#### Republican Party

**Patricia Ann Wilson** (Republican) - incumbent

No Democratic candidates have filed for this race.

## Previous elections

### 2024 election

This seat was not up for election in 2024.

### 2020 election

**Patricia Ann Wilson** (Republican) defeated **Thomas Garcia** (Democratic)
with 64% of the vote.

## District demographics

The district has a population of approximately 150,000 residents.
The district leans Republican by voter registration.
